name: Flip.com
overview:
Flip.com is an online social network for teenage girls that enables them to make online scrapbooks, or “flipbooks.” The site encourages users to Upload or transfer photos, music, and videos from either their PC or Facebook or Photobucket, edit and design the flipbook’s presentation and image, and edit art: write text; add a soundtrack; or draw freestyle. Users can share their creations make and share your flipbooks on Facebook with the Flipbook creator application.

Books can be embedded on most popular social networking sites.
